episodes.title: 17 - Cult Expert, Ex-Moonie & Author, Diane Benscoter (Part 2)
episodes.description: To wrap up season one of Cult Talk, cult expert and author Diane Benscoter joins us to share her story of joining the Moonies, how brainwashing works, and why coercive control is so damaging to and powerful over those in its grip. (Part 2 of 2) Segments: A Rape of the Soul You Own Prison Guard Helping At-Risk People Find Diane's memoir, Shoes Of A Servant on Amazon , or anywhere you buy books. Follow Diane on Twitter . Watch Diane's "Own Your Brain" video series on YouTube . Cult Talk Social Media links - Twitter @CultTalk / Instagram @culttalk / Facebook Group: Cult Talk with Erin Martin Hosted on Acast. episodes.title: 15 - Ex-COBU Member, Darlene Griffith (Part 2)
episodes.description: Darlene Griffith joined COBU when it was in its infancy and known by its original name, The Forever Family. It's there that she met her husband, slowly realized Stewart's false teachings, and ultimately, found her way out of the group. (Part 2 of 2) I Was My Own Counselor The Paradox Why Are They So Special? episodes.title: 07 - Ex-COBU Member & Author, James LaRue (Part 2)
episodes.description: Erin talks to James LaRue about his 14 years in the Church of Bible Understanding (COBU) cult. James is currently an artist and author who writes about his experiences in the COBU and explores the psychology of “total institutions” – a concept applied by cults throughout history, and a framework that makes it very difficult for members to escape. (Part 2 of 2) Follow Cult Talk on Instagram @culttalk and Twitter @CultTalk Join the Cult Talk with Erin Martin Facebook group (click on "groups" to search on FB or click here: https://www.facebook.com/groups/392834007920576/ ) James’ website: Everything You Wanted to Know About COBU (But Were Afraid to Ask) James’ Facebook Page: Cobu Stories on Facebook Find James’ books Amazon: Captive Congregation & The Tangled Web Explore James’ artwork: James LaRue Illustrations Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: 01 - Erin's Mother, Judy: Before Finding The Cult
episodes.description: My mother, Judy, talks about the 1960s environment in suburban PA she found herself in at the end of high school, what factors led her to search for something different than the world in which she was raised, and how she found "The Forever Family." Chapters: Eyes Opening to the World Act of Rebellion Normal Life Before Joining Awaking to Christianity Finding the Family Source Material: https://www.culteducation.com/group/1210-church-of-bible-understanding/21586-on-the-traill-difficult-to-peg-reclusive-lead.html Follow Cult Talk on Instagram @culttalk and Twitter @CultTalk Join the Cult Talk with Erin Martin Facebook group (click on "groups" to search on FB or click here: https://www.facebook.com/groups/392834007920576/ ) Hosted on Acast.
